description: A Flutter provider class that manages user profile state, including fetching and updating user profile data via API calls.

classes.name: ProfileProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that handles user profile data, loading state, and error handling.

methods.name: fetchProfile
methods.description: Fetches the user's profile information from the API and updates internal state.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Sends updated profile data to the API and updates internal state accordingly.
